Package root

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Battle
    This class handles battles done by 2 users.
    Breeding
    This class handles breeding between 2 monsters.
    Database
    This class handles communication between the server and the database, sending and executing the queries.
    GameServer  
    Monster
    A monster in the server, it has an owner, stats and multiple cash values for battling, breeding and selling.
    Request
    This class stores all data regarding requests; the users and monster involved and the type of the request.
    User
    This class describes a user in the server, it stores their credentials and their list of monsters, friends and requests.
    UserManager
    Manages all the users and monsters in the database, such as adding and getting users by name or id.
